title: Can't seem to be able to launch the app, or re download it.
body:
I have a mac.

Couldn't open up the app so I figured I'll go redownload it. Fast forward a download later and I get a warning that the newly downloaded League of Legends is damaged and can't be opened. Trashed that.

Went back to redownload again, get informed that there's a newer version of League of Legends already on my computer after deleting it from my computer in the first place. Choose to replace it with a new download. The new download is, once again, damaged and can't be opened.

Currently scanning my computer for leftover files. Any advice on how to get rid of any damaged files and completely reset League of Legends would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Let's try to start from scratch since it sounds like League isn't being completely uninstalled in the first place. Grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with admin rights with reinstall and clean uninstall checked. If that doesn't help, make sure you reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some deeper troubleshooting.
